data.name: Solomon Snow - First Contact
data.detailed_description:
Sometimes when you come to work, the Solar System is under attack. Glakmirk battle cruiser has landed on Neptune and portals to the other planets are open. This is what you – as Solomon Snow - an ordinary security worker, have to deal with today: an alien army coming out of the gateway in the Futuresalt Corp basement.

Save the planet, colleagues, and your company!


You’re the only one who can save us, so don’t waste more time and jump into the action. Try to kill as many aliens as possible and save everyone trapped in the Futuresalt Corp building.

There will be many challenges on the way, and you’ll have to be as smart as quick to get out of this situation. Many of them will require puzzle solving skills, get ready! The world is counting on you, Solomon Snow!



That is what you – as Solomon Snow - an ordinary security worker, have on today to-dos list:

  • defeat aliens
  • combine your team
  • explore the world to solve puzzles
  • improve your skills
  • defeat bosses
  • close the portal in the final battle

How do you think you're doing?

Solomon Snow's story gets you right into the Futuresalt Corps building and from the very beginning you have to do whatever you can to protect your co-workers. This won't be a simple shooting operation, you'll have to get better at solving puzzles.



Shoot around, look around!

Futuresalt co-workers have some unique properties, such as default items that can be used by the player during gameplay, like door keys, shovel, fire extinguisher, pistol or even a hammer to crash the walls. Collect the items, distribute them inside your team and fight the evil together.



Weapons and collectibles

Solomon Snow will find a lot of items on his way, from hammers to fire extinguishers to weapons that will help him to clean the whole cosmic mess - by far our favorite weapon is the machine gun, but the alien weapon is also not bad!



38 different levels on your way

You have to climb to the top of the skyscraper and visit all the rooms in which the survivors are hiding - they can help you along the ways. Each level is different, each of them has different challenges - it's up to you to overcome them with cunning or strength.



Solomon Snow has amazing skills that you can develop during the game with skill points - the more puzzles you solve and the more aliens you defeat, the faster you develop your character.

Improve your skills!

During the game, the player can grow characters special skills, as well as acquire or purchase items that facilitate the game, such as a backpack in which you can store more collectibles or even allay aliens.

5 skill groups

  • Soldier
  • Agility
  • Vitality
  • Commander
  • Specialist



A total of 15 skills to acquire!

  • Boot Camp - reload speed +15%
  • Combat Drill- damage +15%
  • Area 51 - can use alien weaponry
  • Athlete - movement speed +15%
  • Close Quarters - can push an incoming enemy away
  • Executioner - 15% chance for an instant kill against a weakened enemy
  • Cornfed - permanent health +15%
  • Survivor - health recovery +1HP/3sec
  • See Red - damage +50% when HP is less or equal to 16%
  • Ammo Expert - one of the group members becomes an Ammo Expert and has 50% chance to reload an empty Rifle or a Grenade slot. Ammo Expert can NOT reload the same weapon two times in a row
  • Field Medic - one of the group members becomes a Field Medic and automatically revives a ≤20% team member with +20% HP (ability on cooldown)
  • Blood Transfusion - HP transfer from a group member: ≤30%
  • Boomer - can use grenades
  • Forced Entry - can blast doors open with a grenade or a rifle
  • Troy - can plant grenades inside enemy corpses


Fight the bosses like a boss!

Every janitor gets bored by just killing the same kind of aliens, so in Solomon Snow there are bosses everywhere that make the game much more demanding.





4 bosses, and one of them, that looks like a crab-scorpion!
Each boss has a different combat system, you have to find out a way to defeat him before you will be killed by his army, and himself.



Commons aliens!
There will also be common aliens that will make your life difficult on the way to victory, and some of them that looks like that. Small tip, beware of his arms!



Remember this name - Solomon Snow

Single player 3D top down action, shooter casual game with soft puzzles inspired by classics such as Alien Breed, Duke Nukem or even John McClane from Die Hard. The “First Contact” is the premiere part of Solomon’s adventure. It's a game set in the Low Poly aesthetics and is designed to run smoothly on any older hardware, no matter if it's a smartphone, PC, iiRcade, and console. The rules are simple. You have to save the World. Among that, you need to finish every level, protect your co-workers, defeat aliens, bosses, growth your skills, and close the Aliens’ portal.

data.short_description: Sometimes when you come to work, the Solar System is under attack. Glakmirk battle cruiser has landed on Neptune and portals to the other planets are open, and as Solomon Snow - an ordinary security worker, have to deal with an alien army coming out of the gateway in the Futuresalt Corp.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible, NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
